imagingbook.pub.regions

Class Contour

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.regions.Contour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Contour>, Iterable<Point>

    public class Contour
extends Object
implements Comparable<Contour>, Iterable<Point>
    This class represents a closed contour as a sequence of pixel coordinates. It implements the Comparable interface for sorting contours by length. It supports iteration over the points along the contour, e.g., by 
     Contour C = ...;
 for (Point p : C) {
    // process p ...
 }
    Version:
    2016-11-08

      • getPolygonPath

        public Path2D getPolygonPath(double xOffset,
                             double yOffset)
        Get the polygon for this contour (for subsequent drawing). An offset can be specified for shifting the contour positions at pixel centers (set to 0.5/0.5).
        Parameters:
        xOffset - the horizontal offset.
        yOffset - the vertical offset.
        Returns:
        a polygon.
